entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who has created new breeds of magical creatures, specifically 'Blast-Ended Skrewts'. He considers himself to be above restrictions from the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures.

entities.name: blast-ended skrewts
entities.description: Blast-Ended Skrewts are highly dangerous creatures created by Hagrid as a cross between manticores and fire-crabs.

entities.name: manticores
entities.description: Manticores are mentioned as one of the parents of the 'Blast-Ended Skrewts'.

entities.name: fire-crabs
entities.description: Fire-crabs are mentioned as the other parent of the 'Blast-Ended Skrewts'.

entities.name: department for the regulation and control of magical creatures
entities.description: The Department is mentioned as an organization that usually closely observes the creation of new breeds of magical creatures.

entities.name: blast-ended skrewts
entities.description: Blast-Ended Skrewts are highly dangerous creatures created by Hagrid as a cross between manticores and fire-crabs.

relationships.entity_1: department for the regulation and control of magical creatures
relationships.description: The Department usually closely observes the creation of new breeds of magical creatures, including 'Blast-Ended Skrewts'.
